params.name: projectDir
params.description: absolute path to the titanium project directory

params.name: path
params.description: absolute path to the path in Resources

name: src/hook/faster.js
init
description:
attach cli hooks to titanium CLI
this function must be named "init"

ti build --faster [--ft-port 4157] [--ft-debug]

name: filter
description:
check --faster flag, then execute given fn with error handling.
"this" is "scope" defined in "init" function.

name: launchServers
description: launch file/event servers to communicate with App

name: generateNewAppJS
description:
Generate new app.js code.
New app.js consists of bundled lib of faster-titanium and one line initializer

name: isAlloyCompatible
description:
Check if global alloy compatible with faster-titanium
Kill this process if not compatible.
Global alloy is used to compile at first build in faster-titanium.
Subsequent builds are done by alloy in faster-titanium's node_modules.
If two alloy versions mismatch, the app can be broken.

name: src/server/alloy-compiler.js
suppressAlloyLog
description: suppress normal log in alloy compilation

name: src/server/app-js-converter.js
AppJsConverter
description: parse original app.js and export variables to global

name: convert
src/server/content-responder.js
ContentResponder
description: return Promise of ResponseInfo by URL

name: resource
description: load a file in Resources directory

name: src/server/file-server.js
handleURL
description: get instance of ResponseInfo with url matching passed routes

name: src/server/file-watcher.js
justEmitted
description: whether the last change event was emitted during the past 1000msec

name: onChange
description:
Called when a file is changed.
Sometimes watcher calls this twice to the same file, so memorizes past emission

name: src/server/main-process.js

params.name: options.fPort
params.description: port number of the file server

params.name: options.nPort
params.description: port number of the notification server

name: registerListeners
description:
register event listeners.
called only once in constructor

name: launchServers
description: launch file server and notification server

name: onResourceFileChanged
description: called when files in Resources directory changed

name: onAlloyFileChanged
description:
Called when files in app directory (Alloy project) changed
Compile alloy. During compilation, unwatch Resources directory.

name: send
description: send message to the client of notification server

name: sendEvent
description: send reload|reflect event to the titanium client

name: src/server/notification-server.js
NotificationServer
description:
Server connecting continuously with Titanium App.
Restrict connection: only one device can connect to the server.

name: verifyClient
description: check the client has the right access token

name: onData
description:
Called when data comes from client
Split into multiple payloads

name: src/server/optimize-alloy.js
optimizeAlloy
description: optimize js file in Alloy project and save it to Resources

unknown.tagValue: it now re-writes js files other than alloy.js

name: init
description: virtual constructor for this singleton class

name: alert

run

name: registerListeners
description:
register event listeners.
called only once in constructor

name: showDialog
description:
Show dialog with given message
The dialog will close in {msec} milliseconds.

description: connect to notification server and begin app with the given code

name: onPayload

name: reflect
description: clear existing caches of the changed modules

content:
export default {
    position: 'absolute',
    left: 0,
    top: 0,
    width:'100%',
    height:'100%',
    textAlign:'center',
    zIndex: 1000,
    borderRadius: 3,
    background: 'rgba(50,50,50, 0.6)',
}
